modmenu.summaryTranslation.foggy-pale-ga: Adds fog to the Pale Garden and anywhere else!
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.foggy-pal: Explore the mod's page and you can add any fog to any place in the game thanks to a flexible configuration system.
